attributes.action: provide a system of voter on-line consultation of all bills and papers going through parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each voter should be given a unique identifier that allows them to register an electronic opinion on every bill and paper going through parliament. Key questions with options for selection should accompany each bill or paper to help the voter to express that opinion.  The analysis of public opinion on each bill and paper should be made available to everyone. The views of the electronic electorate will be for information only and will not count towards any parliamentary decision.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
